name: FlotillAssassin
description:
Destroy your target with limited ammunition and run for it before being destroy yourself.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aiming
  • Left Mousebutton - Fire
  • Shift - Boost

Made for "Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam" using all 3 themes.

  • Space - Setting
  • Voxels - Artstyle
  • "Only one matters" - Only one enemy matters, get in and out

Skybox made with SpaceScape.

Everything else was made by me.
